long_description: Durable built for tykes ready to get rollin', the Diamondback Mini Viper 16 in. kids' bike features removable training wheels to teach balance. Sturdy steel frame and fork are built to handle the rigors of riding. Single-speed drivetrain with protective chainguard offers simplicity and low maintenance. Rear coaster brake eases the learning of the fine art of speed management; all kids have to do is simply backpedal to engage the brake. 16 in. wheels are outfitted with all-terrain Comp III tires for performance on and off the road. Diamondback Mini Viper 16 in. kids' bike includes a set of heavy-duty, removable training wheels to get new riders started on the basics of balance. Specs are subject to change.
short_description: Durable built for tykes ready to get rollin', the Diamondback Mini Viper 16 in. kids' bike features removable training wheels to teach balance.
